r.s: A public frontend for a University Event Publishing system.
r.d: This class extends the UNL UCBCN backend system to create a client frontend. It allows users to view the calendar in a list view, thirty day view.
r.n: * Fix Bug #24: html doctitles not generated correctly for calendars other than default * New Feature some AJAX calls for day navigation. * New Feature Next and Previous links for each Day. * Implement Request #26 Search should look in description, location, and event type. * Fix Bug #30 Ongoing events will not activate link to that day. * Fix Bug #28 Room Number doesn't show up on Live Calendar. * Fix Bug #33 Missing subscribe link for local (non-default) calendar. Added lots of documentation now available at http://pear.unl.edu/docs/UNL_UCBCN_Frontend/
